            Hi!
            I‚Äôm a Social Data Scientist with a background in Political Science, applied quantitative methods, and causal inference.
            Today, I‚Äôm mostly into spatial data analysis, data visualization, football analytics, and programming in .
            If you‚Äôd like to learn more about what me, what I do, and what I‚Äôm working on, check out:
            My profile. Here you can read more about me and my background
            My gallery, where I showcase my recent data visualizations
            The  packages that I have developed
            My blog, where I occasionally post tutorials etc.

              Hi!
              I‚Äôm a Social Data Scientist with a background in Political Science, applied quantitative methods, and causal inference.
              Today, I‚Äôm mostly into spatial data analysis, data visualization, football analytics, and programming in .
              If you‚Äôd like to learn more about what me, what I do, and what I‚Äôm working on, check out:
              My profile. Here you can read more about me and my background
              My gallery, where I showcase my recent data visualizations

              My blog, where I occasionally post tutorials etc.
